nodes.text: The Empire Strikes Back is a canon young-readers adaptation of the original trilogy film Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back. It was written by Geof Smith and published by Golden Books on July 28, 2015.
Just in time for the release of Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens…the first six Star Wars films are finally retold in Little Golden Books!

The epic space saga, Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back, is finally retold in the iconic Little Golden Book format! After the destruction of the Death Star, the Empire has regrouped—with Darth Vader leading the hunt for Luke Skywalker. Featuring stunning retro illustrations, this book is perfect for Star Wars—and Little Golden Book—fans of all ages!
